entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Periods of rain beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 02 January 2023
